name: editor-extensions
description: VSCode Extension for Konveyor to assist in migrating and modernizing applications.
author: Konveyor

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w vscode" "npm run start -w webview-ui"
scripts.build: npm run build -w webview-ui && npm run build -w vscode
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run package -w vscode
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test -w vscode
